reg_info.act_under: Health Care Accessibility Act   Loi sur l’accessibilité aux services de santé

content.content: 1. A hospital may accept co-payments for accommodation and meals under section 10 of Regulation 552 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (chronic care). O. Reg. 495/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A hospital may accept co-payments for accommodation and meals under section 10 of Regulation 552 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (chronic care). O. Reg. 495/96, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 113/96, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 113/96, s. 2.
